nodes.documentation:
@title Havven State
@notice Stores issuance information and preferred currency information of the Havven contract.
nodes.name: HavvenState
setCurrentIssuanceData
clearIssuanceData

nodes.documentation:
@notice Increment the total issuer count
@dev Only the associated contract may call this.
nodes.name: incrementTotalIssuerCount

nodes.documentation:
@notice Decrement the total issuer count
@dev Only the associated contract may call this.
nodes.name: decrementTotalIssuerCount
appendDebtLedgerValue
setPreferredCurrency

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "New issuance ratio cannot exceed MAX_ISSUANCE_RATIO"

arguments.value: New issuance ratio cannot exceed MAX_ISSUANCE_RATIO

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "New issuance ratio cannot exceed MAX_ISSUANCE_RATIO"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the issuanceRatio for issuance calculations.
@dev Only callable by the contract owner.
nodes.name: setIssuanceRatio

nodes.documentation:
@notice Import issuer data from the old Havven contract before multicurrency
@dev Only callable by the contract owner, and only for 1 week after deployment.
nodes.name: importIssuerData

nodes.documentation:
@notice Import issuer data from the old Havven contract before multicurrency
@dev Only used from importIssuerData above, meant to be disposable
nodes.name: _addToDebtRegister

nodes.documentation: @notice Retrieve the length of the debt ledger array
nodes.name: debtLedgerLength

nodes.documentation: @notice Retrieve the most recent entry from the debt ledger
nodes.name: lastDebtLedgerEntry

nodes.documentation:
@notice Query whether an account has issued and has an outstanding debt balance
@param account The address to query for
nodes.name: hasIssued
